adept.serialization

Class AbstractBinarySerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.serialization.AbstractSerializer
      • adept.serialization.AbstractBinarySerializer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JSONBinarySerializer

    public abstract class AbstractBinarySerializer
extends AbstractSerializer
    Abstract superclass for serializers that serialize from and to a compressed binary-type format. The resulting byte array is based on a serialized string as returned from the corresponding implementation of AbstractStringSerializer.serializeToString(Object).
